## In this talk

In this presentation we will briefly present our analysis of the effect of smoking on birthweight using a publicly-available data set. There are six sections:

::: {.incremental}

- The research question
- Curating the data
- Exploring the data
- Descriptive Modelling
- Predictive modelling
- Conclusions

:::

## The research question

In this analysis, we addressed two research questions:

- What is the relationship between smoking during pregnancy and a child's birthweight?

- Can maternal factors measured during pregnancy be used to accurately predict infants at risk of low birthweight?
